InstalledItem.Name: Ecouter
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Radar
Manufacturer: GNP
Size: 1
Grade: C
Class: Military

Space is vast and unknowable, that’s why discerning pilots rely on the Ecouter small radar from GNP to keep them in the know about what’s around them.

InstalledItem.Name: RSI Self Destruct
InstalledItem.Description: [PH] RSI Self Destruct

InstalledItem.Name: Surveyor
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Radar
Manufacturer: Chimera Communications
Size: 2
Grade: C
Class: Industrial

The Surveyor radar from Chimera Communications does away with all the unnecessary extras other manufacturers hide behind to focus on what matters: signature and emission detection that works the way you need it to.

InstalledItem.Name: VariPuck S4 Gimbal Mount
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Flashfire Systems
Item Type: Weapon Mount
Size: 4

The VariPuck fits between your weapon and the ship hardpoint to transform a fixed weapon mount into a gimballed mount, allowing the pilot to independently aim their weapon’s fire. VariPucks will accept any weapon one size smaller than the hardpoint it is mounting to.

InstalledItem.Name: CF-337 Panther Repeater
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Klaus & Werner
Item Type: Laser Repeater
Size: 3

The CF-337 Panther is the size three model in Klaus & Werner's laser repeater line. The Panther is a true fire-and-forget weapon with a respectable power consumption-to-damage ratio. Pilots who outfit their ships with Panthers rarely regret the decision.

InstalledItem.Name: SolarFlare
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Power Plant
Manufacturer: ACOM
Size: 2
Grade: C
Class: Competition

The ACOM team took their years of experience in the racing world and applied it to their component designs. That focus has helped make the SolarFlare a popular power plant among pilots that want to prioritize performance.

InstalledItem.Name: Anvil Decoy Launcher
InstalledItem.Description: Anvil Decoy Launcher

InstalledItem.Name: Anvil Noise Launcher
InstalledItem.Description: Anvil Noise Launcher

InstalledItem.Name: FullStop
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Shield Generator
Manufacturer: Gorgon Defender Industries
Size: 2
Grade: C
Class: Military

Featuring proprietary recoil tech, the FullStop shield generator was built to better absorb attacks from a multitude of damage types.

InstalledItem.Name: Bracer
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Cooler
Manufacturer: Aegis Dynamics 
Size: 1
Grade: C
Class: Military

For those looking for a solid, dependable mid-line cooler, you can’t do much better than Aegis’ Bracer. This small-frame cooler system offers solid performance and durability to keep your ship firing on all cylinders.

InstalledItem.Name: Bracer
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Cooler
Manufacturer: Aegis Dynamics 
Size: 1
Grade: C
Class: Military

For those looking for a solid, dependable mid-line cooler, you can’t do much better than Aegis’ Bracer. This small-frame cooler system offers solid performance and durability to keep your ship firing on all cylinders.

InstalledItem.Name: Expedition
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Quantum Drive
Manufacturer: Tarsus 
Size: 1
Grade: C
Class: Civilian

Cruise through space confident that your perfectly balanced Expedition quantum drive from Tarsus will get you exactly where you’re going.

InstalledItem.Name: MSD-212 Missile Rack
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Missile Rack
Manufacturer: Behring
Size: 2
Missiles: 1xS2

Behring’s MSD-212 "Marsden" is a complete ordnance storage and deployment system that can be mounted on any compatible size 2 hardpoint for the reliable and effective launch of one S2 missile.

InstalledItem.Name: Ignite II Missile
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Firestorm Kinetics
Tracking Signal: Infrared
Size: 2

The Ignite is Firestorm's premier brand of heat-seeking strike missile that is the definition of Fire and Forget. Simply let it fly and enjoy the show.
